Captain.Title: Culluh
Captain.Ability: When defending, roll +1 defense die for every [TECH] Upgrade deployed to your ship (max +2).

Captain.Title: Tavin
Captain.Ability: At any time, you may replace 1 [EVADE], [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship for 1 [EVADE], [SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] Token. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.
